title: The Banner Saga (MULTI8) - FitGirl
description:
::Information::


Release Date: Jan 14, 2014
Genres/Tags: RPG, Strategy, Tactics, Isometric, 2D, Turn-based
Developer: Stoic
Publisher: Versus Evil
Platform: PC [Repack]
Engine: in-house
Steam User Rating: 90% of user reviews are positive (based on 5,397 reviews)

Interface Language: English, French, German, Spanish, Polish, Portuguese-Brazil, Russian, Italian
Audio Language: English
Crack: built-in (PROPHET/RELOADED)


::Repack Features::


Based on The.Banner.Saga.MULTi8-PROPHET ISO release: ppt-tbs8.iso (4,680,998,912 bytes)
Game version is v2.18.08; Mad Viking & Mod Content DLCs included
100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
Mod Content DLC can be skipped for downloading and installing
Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 4.4 to 1.5/2.2 GB)
Installation takes: ~7 minutes on 8-cores CPU; ~12 minutes on 4-cores CPU; ~20 minutes on 2-cores CPU. Installing of DevTools adds another 5-7 minutes
After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
HDD space after installation: from 2 to 5 GB (~7 GB during installation)
Language can be changed in game options
Repack by FitGirl
